testimonials.heading: Contact Us
testimonials.body: Good or bad, We would love to hear your opinion on Resume Builder and how the experience has been for you.
testimonials.contact: You can reach out to me through <1>Our Email</1> or through the contact form on <3>Our Website</3>.

summary.body: Resume Builder is a free resume builder that's built to make the mundane tasks of creating, updating and sharing your resume as easy as 1, 2, 3. With this app, you can create multiple resumes, share them with recruiters or friends through a unique link and print it as a PDF, all for free, without losing the integrity and privacy of your data.
summary.heading: Summary
